---
title: Adding filters in a single click
route: '/annotations'
target: '#annot-table tr:nth-child(7) > td:nth-child(4)'
placement: top
nextOnTargetClick: true
---

Hover over a cell you will see the filter icon
<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="20px" alt="filter"></img>. Click on it to instantly add a filter based on the column and value selected.
